product_metadata.product_name: Bajaj Life Guaranteed Pension Goal II
product_metadata.plan_type: Non-linked, Non-participating Immediate & Deferred Annuity Plan
product_metadata.key_disclaimer: Guaranteed benefits depend on purchase price and annuity option chosen.

product_summary.objective: Guaranteed Pension Goal II helps individuals retire early with guaranteed lifelong income by allowing them to purchase an annuity (Immediate or Deferred) and receive regular pension payouts throughout life, with multiple joint-life and return-of-purchase-price options.
key_highlights: Return of Purchase Price (50%–100%) options available
Joint-life pension with 50% or 100% continuation to spouse
Survival return options after age 70/85 depending on option
Family Pension option for NPS subscribers
Health Management Services included at no extra cost

plan_variants.income_start: As early as next month depending on frequency chosen
After completion of deferment period chosen at inception

core_benefits.details: Annuity amount is guaranteed at inception and paid throughout life as per chosen payout frequency.

options.B: Life Annuity with Return of Purchase Price (50%–100%) on death
options.C: Annuity Certain (5/10/15/20 years) and life thereafter
options.D: Joint Life – 50% annuity to spouse after death
options.E: Joint Life – 100% annuity to spouse after death
options.F: Joint Life – 100% spouse annuity + ROP on death of last survivor
options.G: Life Annuity + ROP as survival benefit after 25 years or age 85
options.H: Life Annuity + ROP paid in installments after 15 years or age 70
options.I: Family Pension – Special for NPS subscribers

core_benefits.details: Annuity begins after deferment period. Death during deferment pays Death Benefit Factor × Total Premiums Paid (minimum 105%).
core_benefits.rop_rule: In Deferred Single Premium, ROP is mandatorily 100%.

core_benefits.details: Under selected annuity options, X% (50%–100%) of purchase price is returned on death or survival event.

core_benefits.floor: Minimum death benefit = 105% of Total Premiums Paid (during deferment).
core_benefits.immediate_annuity: ROP as per chosen option payable on death.

surrender_applicable: Options B, F, G, H, I during annuity period

surrender_value.during_deferment: Higher of Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV) or Special Surrender Value (SSV)

compliance_guardrails.guaranteed_income_disclaimer: Guaranteed pension depends on annuity rates at inception.
compliance_guardrails.irda_guidelines: Product governed under IRDAI annuity and pension regulations.
compliance_guardrails.pos_restriction: POS channel offers only Option B immediate annuity with ROP.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits subject to prevailing laws.
compliance_guardrails.free_look_period: 30 days from receipt of policy document.
compliance_guardrails.fraud_warning: IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.

retrieval_chunks.text: Plan offers Immediate Annuity starting next month or Deferred Annuity starting after chosen deferment period.
Options A–I include life annuity, joint life pension, annuity certain, survival return and family pension for NPS.
ROP options allow returning 50%–100% of purchase price on death or survival event depending on option chosen.
Surrender is allowed only under options B,F,G,H,I during annuity period and for all deferred annuities during deferment.
Policyholders can access free optional wellness services like second opinion and consultation via third-party providers.
